title: Regulation (EEC) No 1031/75 of the Commission of 17 April 1975 defining the event in which the subsidy in respect of cotton seeds becomes due and payable
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1031/75 OF THE COMMISSION  of 17 April 1975  defining the event in which the subsidy in respect of cotton seeds becomes due and payable
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The event within the meaning of Article 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1134/68 in which the subsidy for cotton seeds becomes due and payable shall be considered to have occurred on 1 November following the beginning of each marketing year.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1975.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 April 1975.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
